modName: Revert Aspect of Terror Change in Unoffical Skyrim Patch
summary: This reverts the change to the Aspect of Terror perk that the Unofficial Skyrim patch made.  With this mod you will get your bonus fire damage for your spells back.
descriptionHtml:
This reverts the change to the Aspect of Terror perk that the Unofficial Skyrim patch made.  With this mod you will get your bonus fire damage for your spells back.  This mod must be loaded after the Unofficial Skyrim Patch in the load order.  

Here is a link to the unofficial skyrim patch if you don\'t have it.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19

Here is a link to my mod that reverts the change to the necromage perk that the unofficial patch made.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29474
author: Ninja117

files.name: Revert Aspect of Terror Change in USKP
